name: Dinosaur Hunter & Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in the world of ferocious Jurassic dinosaurs!Hunt dinosaurs, complete tasks, get rewards and unlock powerful new weapons! Try yourself as a dinosaur surviving in the harsh world of the Jurassic period.  A wide variety of dinosaurs will not let you get bored. Become a harmless herbivore parasaurolophus or a giant predatory tyrannosaurus rex! The world of Jurassic dinosaurs is waiting for you!
